metadata.name: PUA - CsExec Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the use of the lesser known remote execution tool named CsExec a PsExec alternative

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\csexec.exe')) OR lower(device.desc) = lower('csexec')))

output.summary: Detects the use of the lesser known remote execution tool named CsExec a PsExec alternative
